sentence.Network_en: Surely the adamantine barrier of her marriage with another could not be pieced like this!
sentence.Network_cn: 毫无疑问,她与另一个人的婚姻设下的强固的障碍不能这样去突破.

sentence.Network_en: Their adamantine conservatism is the slow outgrowth of this experience.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种经历缓慢地培育了他们顽固的保守主义.

means.word_mean: 1. consisting of or having the hardness of adamant
2. having the hardness of a diamond
3. not capable of being swayed or diverted from a course; unsusceptible to persuasion;

sentences.sentence: "he is adamant in his refusal to change his mind"
"Cynthia was inexorable; she would have none of him"- W.Churchill
"an intransigent conservative opposed to every liberal tendancy"
